alert.note: Alert for Ashland; Burnett; Iron; Price; Sawyer; Washburn (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 13 at 7:19PM CST until December 15 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation. Additional snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches and ice accumulations of up to two tenths of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Ashland, Iron, Burnett, Washburn, Sawyer and Price Counties. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Bad River Reservation and the Lac Courte Oreilles Reservation. * WHEN...Until 6 PM CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions will impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The greatest ice accumulation will be this evening into early Wednesday morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Road conditions can also be found at 511mn.org for Minnesota or 511wi.gov for Wisconsin.

area.areaDesc: Ashland; Burnett; Iron; Price; Sawyer; Washburn
